name: PAT Issuer
description: Installs the Azure DevOps Personal Access Token Issuer

version.description: Select or enter a patissuer version

aadTenantID.description: Select or enter the AAD Tenant ID

aadClientID.description: Select or enter the AAD Client ID

azdoOrganization.description: Enter the name of your Azure DevOps organization

azdoProject.description: Enter the name of your Azure DevOps project

azdoFqdn.description: Enter the fqdn of Azure DevOps

azdoNpmArtifactFeed.description: Enter the name of the AzDO NPM Artifact feed. This will lead to a .npmrc being created. Mostly useful for NPM repos

gitAlias.description: Enter the desired git alias. This will be added as an 'insteadOf' in the git config. Mostly useful for Golang repos

tokenScope.description: Select or enter the AzDO PAT Scope(s)

tokenVariable.description: Select or enter the PAT Token env variable name
